com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck

Interface NetworkStateChecker


  • public interface NetworkStateChecker
    Defines the behavior of a component able to monitor network state. Different implementations will provide the network state using different network connections (either wifi only, or wifi & mobile). Network state is checked and cached, then made available via a getter method. When network status changes, an event is triggered to a potentialy registered listener.
    Author:
    Deezer
